movie.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
movie.actors: Liam Neeson, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Jake Lloyd
movie.plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 26 wins & 65 nominations.
